channel.title: Good Film Hunting
channel.itunes:keywords: movie, film, summer, college, funny, boston, review, culture, good, cinema, theater
channel.itunes:author: Andrew Mellen, Erich Ryan, Bryan Varela
channel.description: Three bored college students from Boston fill their time with hot takes and scathing reviews about the hit movies of the summer.
channel.itunes:summary: Three bored college students from Boston fill their time with hot takes and scathing reviews about the hit movies of the summer.

item.title: 001 - Aladdin and Longshot
item.itunes:title: Aladdin and Longshot
item.itunes:author: Andrew Mellen, Erich Ryan, Bryan Varela
item.description: Today we explore the two big movies of the week, Aladdin and Longshot. We also look ahead to what else we are excited to see this summer.
item.itunes:summary: Today we explore the two big movies of the week, Aladdin and Longshot. We also look ahead to what else we are excited to see this summer.
item.itunes:subtitle: Today we explore the two big movies of the week, Aladdin and Longshot. We also look ahead to what else we are excited to see this summer.

item.title: 002 - Godzilla and Rocketman
item.itunes:title: Godzilla and Rocketman
item.itunes:author: Andrew Mellen, Erich Ryan, Bryan Varela
item.description: The summer of great movies has officially begun. This week we have the king of the monsters (Godzilla) and the king of glam rock (Rocketman). We also talk a bit about Brightburn.
item.itunes:summary: The summer of great movies has officially begun. This week we have the king of the monsters (Godzilla) and the king of glam rock (Rocketman). We also talk a bit about Brightburn.
item.itunes:subtitle: The summer of great movies has officially begun. This week we have the king of the monsters (Godzilla) and the king of glam rock (Rocketman). We also talk a bit about Brightburn.

item.title: 003 - Dark Pheonix, Booksmart, The Dead Don't Die
item.itunes:title: Dark Pheonix, Booksmart, The Dead Don't Die
item.itunes:author: Andrew Mellen, Erich Ryan, Raymond Jenks
item.description: A lot of craziness this week. Raymond guest stars as a sub in for Bryan. We review a good movie, an awful movie, and a potential cult classic. Which one is which? Tune in to find out!
item.itunes:summary: A lot of craziness this week. Raymond guest stars as a sub in for Bryan. We review a good movie, an awful movie, and a potential cult classic. Which one is which? Tune in to find out!
item.itunes:subtitle: A lot of craziness this week. Raymond guest stars as a sub in for Bryan. We review a good movie, an awful movie, and a potential cult classic. Which one is which? Tune in to find out!

item.title: 004 - Toy Story 4
item.itunes:title: Toy Story 4
item.itunes:author: Andrew Mellen, Erich Ryan
item.description: SPOILER ALERT!!! A franchise near and dear to our hearts, we had the pleasure (or was it?) of seeing Toy Story 4 this week. Does it deface the franchise or does it do the impossible and improve on a perfect trilogy? Give us a listen to find out! (plus we talk about Men In Black: International a little bit)
